testsuite.name: com.report.test.transactionLog

testcase.name: verifyTransactionLog
testcase.system-out: Click on Report Module Click on Transaction Log Sub Module Verify user is on the Transaction Log page Click on the Date range select date range :- Last 30 Days User enter purchase ID in Purchase ID text Field Click on Search Button Click on Download Button Click on Purchase ID Button Verified same purchase ID is occure Transactional details page Click on close Button in transactional Details page

testcase.name: verify_purchaseIDJson
testcase.system-out: Click on Report Module Click on Transaction Log Sub Module Verify user is on the Transaction Log page Click on the Date range select date range :- Last 30 Days User enter purchase ID in Purchase ID text Field Click on Search Button Verified both purchase ID is Matches

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page Click on Report Module Click on Transaction Log Sub Module Verify user is on the Transaction Log page Click on the Date range select date range :- Last 30 Days User enter purchase ID in Purchase ID text Field Click on Search Button Click on Download Button Click on Purchase ID Button Verified same purchase ID is occure Transactional details page Click on close Button in transactional Details page User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page Click on Report Module Click on Transaction Log Sub Module Verify user is on the Transaction Log page Click on the Date range select date range :- Last 30 Days User enter purchase ID in Purchase ID text Field Click on Search Button Verified both purchase ID is Matches
